title: Center for the Next-Generation of Medical Science based on the fusion of Eastern and Western medicine
description: New challenges of traditional medicines in health science. Institute of Natural Medicine is the only research institute in Japan, devoted in the study of natural medicines with cutting-edge scientific technology. We aim to develop new medicaments and to contribute better health to the society by synchronizing the eastern and western medicine and through research and training.
cleaned_text: ABOUT US New challenges of traditional medicines in health science Institute of Natural Medicine is the only research institute in Japan, devoted in the study of natural medicines with cutting-edge scientific technology. We aim to develop new medicaments and to contribute better health to the society by synchronizing the eastern and western medicine and through research and training.
